title: Flipped Learning-Based Spanish Speaking Interaction Competency Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Spanish grammar and vocabulary knowledge (A1 level)
context.additional_context: University classroom environments with digital device accessibility, incorporating practical language skill requirements for job seekers

learning_goals: Students can perform interactive dialogues meeting DELE A2 speaking assessment criteria with over 80% accuracy through an 11-week flipped learning course
Learners can voluntarily use target language structures three or more times during role-play activities with peers in class, based on pre-learning content (online lectures/materials)
Through project-based assessment, learners can apply four or more interaction strategies (questions/responses/revisions) in Spanish presentations reflecting real-life scenarios (travel/business)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
